# Max Uint8

> Maximum unsigned 8-bit integer.

<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var UINT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint8-max' );
```

#### UINT8_MAX

Maximum unsigned 8-bit integer.

``` javascript
UINT8_MAX === 255;
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

``` javascript
var UINT8_MAX = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/uint8-max' );

console.log( UINT8_MAX );
// => 255
```

<!-- </examples> -->
